subject: p10402372
History: Right lower lobe nodule with bronchiectasis and pseudomonas colonization.
Findings: In comparison with the study of, there is little overall change in the peribronchial thickening and impaction with extensive bibasilar bronchiectasis. This is again extremely well seen on the lateral radiograph. Hyperexpansion of the lungs is consistent with emphysema and the cardiac size is normal. No evidence of pulmonary edema. No evidence of acute focal pneumonia.
Impression: Little change in the severe bronchiectasis and emphysema.
